document_data.name: Sendril's Silks
document_data.mainbody: '''Sendril's Silks''' was a [[silk]] merchant's shop in the town of [[Ormath]] of the [[Shining Plains]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: As of the 14{{th}} century DR, Sendril's Silks was ran by [[Ucharntar Sendril]]. According to [[Elminster Aumar]]'s investigation, Ucharntar was one of the most active agents of the [[Cult of Tiamat]] at the time. The old wizard informed the [[Harpers]] of his findings and recommended for the agents to watch Sendril's Silks as the cult's shillings indicated inevitable expansion into [[Sembia]] and [[Westgate]].
